roleset.name: not involved, connected
roleset.note: Added by JUlia based on BOLT-2,3.

example.name: arg1
example.text: I thought it was a type of amber -LRB- a tree resin product -RRB- , but it is totally unrelated .

example.name: singer S.H. Dudley
example.text: He was unrelated to the black vaudeville performer and impresario Sherman Houston Dudley.
example.arg: to the black vaudeville performer and impresario Sherman Houston Dudley
